website_summaries.verdict: A cordless trimmer and edger with gas-like performance including variable speed control.
pros: Set a slower speed for longer run time
Command Feed spool system to control line feed during operation
MAX Lithium power with battery indicator
Cutting head pivots 90° for adjusting between trimming and edging, and other tasks
cons: Issues with the cutting line breaking
Battery does not last long enough for some users' satisfaction

website_summaries.verdict: Cut the weeds with a cordless trimmer with variable speed motor and a long-lasting lithium battery.
pros: Variable speed control helps maintain more power or longer battery run time
Command Feed spool system helps advance line as needed
Cutting head has pivot adjustments to handle different terrain
Adjust grip comfort with rotating rear handle
Converts from trimmer to inline wheeled edger
cons: Battery has charging issues if connected to the charger immediately after use

customer_reviews.title: Best Worx Trimmer out there. Cuts through brush no problems. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have had the Worx 56v Cordless Grass trimmer for one season and are happy to report it does what it is supposed to do. Clears a wide 13 inch path per pass. Trims brush without problems. We purchased the Worx 56 v trimmer to use around the garden. This gives us to batteries when we need a second. Depending on the amount of brush I am trimming I have been able to trim for half the day without changing the battery. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Noneonrecord

customer_reviews.title: Battery Issues
customer_reviews.text: They shouldn't sell this with one battery; if you use up the battery (to the point where the trimmer stops completely), and then plug in the battery to the charger, the charger will overheat, and stop charging (you get a flashing red light). Now you have to remove the battery, let it cool down, and then finish charging. Not something you would ever know without using the unit. The trimmer itself works fine, and is very versatile. I just need a second battery, but they are VERY expensive - about $130 - $140, and the trimmer only cost $186.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a higher rating in they didn't hype the quality. This is not heavy duty or equal to gas trimmer by any chance. Holds very little string and constantly jams. Fortunately the jams are easy to fix. Replacement cartridges are expensive and self winding jams more. If you have an average sized yard, it works good enough. But don't expect this to work as good as a gas trimmer that holds much thicker string. Battery last 1/2 hour and fully charged in under 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Woolard

customer_reviews.title: JUNK Don't Buy - USELESS in one year
customer_reviews.text: Worked for exactly one year. I tried many times to replace the cutting line. Using a new line spool from Worx, pushing the Command button to feed new line does not work. It quit working with the original line that came with the new product before the spool was empty. The new spool does NOT work either. I paid $169 for this piece of junk. If a new spool of line will not feed the whole machine is USELESS!!! I have never spent so much on a product that hasn't even worked satisfactorily for even one year. You buy this product and you will also be wasting your money!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL P GIBSON

customer_reviews.title: Mowing the WHOLE Block!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment! This trimmer, mower, and hedge trimmer make a great team with a 1/4 acre recommended yard size. The worx team really outdid themselves with the high power, long run time, nice and easy features; it's really commercial grade equipment. Lovin It!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Terrific. Works great, battery life longer than we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely exceeded our expectations. The battery life is pretty good, however I would recommend a second battery. We have the hedge trimmer, blower, and this grass trimmer, with two extra batteries, and we can do our acre lot without cords in half the time it used to take dragging cords everywhere. Half the time, since the cords aren't constantly working against you. Great job WORX! Disclaimer - I don't work for, or know anyone who works for this company. I'm just a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: MHall

customer_reviews.title: 56V Battery Life Very Poor
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is nice. The battery warranty is one year and the battery life is about 13 months. I bought 3 Worx 56V tools with batteries just over a year ago. Two of the batteries will no longer take a charge and the third charges but rapidly loses the charge. This turned out to be a very poor investment.
customer_reviews.author: JCL

customer_reviews.title: Did not last even a year with light use. 3 year warranty but no one answers in customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Maneuverability is very difficult for a short person (5.1), even to move the handle up and down to change directions from weeding to edging. I purchased it in August 2019, already the auto feed has stopped working and even though the battery is flashing that it has full charge, the product has no strength to cut. It has a 3 year warranty, yet no one picks up the phone. No response from Customer service. Trying to get a partial refund from Amazon because I cannot get help from the company itself. Purchased in Aug 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Taskeen

customer_reviews.title: great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and it works well. I'm 57 years young and was able to handle this okay. I am still looking for a solution to trimming the weeds along my wire fences though. The line doesn't last long going along the fence line. It breaks off quickly but maybe it's just me and the way I'm using it. All in all it's a great trimmer and has plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Country girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this weedeaters a couple of months now. The grass had grown up around the house due to excessive rain. This thing handles it with no problem! I bought an extra battery which is a must have if you have much property BUT I'm amazed at how much we can do with one battery. Quiet, reasonably lightweight for the size. I never thought it would come close to gas power, but it does. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: greggtex

customer_reviews.title: Great investment...mega power.
customer_reviews.text: This far out-preformed my expectations! This is easily as powerful as my husbands gas powered trimmer. I was able to go through tall grass and it cut like butter. It made quick work of the job. What is surprising is that it is very lightweight , I had carpel tunnel surgery on my right hand years ago, so it is somewhat weak. This was very easy to use, and I highly recommend this. We live out in the country, so we need a heavy duty tool like this. My husband used it, and was very impressed with the power. I will probably use a lighter weight one in the yard for edging, until I get used to the power!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer and Edger
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand trimmer that I didn't particularly like. I saw this and thought it would work well on my curved concrete mowing strip. And it does. The wheel attachment and adjustable trimmer head makes it easy to trim the edge of the lawn. I also like the way you can control the speed of the spool and the automatic line feed. It's a lot quieter than a gasoline powered trimmer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CA Bill

customer_reviews.title: Cutting line keeps breaking.
customer_reviews.text: It came with a kink in the rod, but decided I needed to start spring yard work more than I wanted to go through the hassle of a return. Repaired it and went on my merry way. I did buy it under the "used" category but the condition was listed as "Very Good". Not. Also, the cutting line keeps breaking very quickly no matter what aftermarket line I buy. Not sure what causes this.
customer_reviews.author: GORDON G.

customer_reviews.title: Ghastly purchase... and I bought extra... just as stuck together as the reel that came with it.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older model with an attempt to get one where the string functioned. What a joke. Great power... but the plastic string is melted together just like the smaller reels and every time you need to advance, you take the whole mechanism apart, pull out and rethread and wait until you repeat. Ghastly. What a misnomer WORX! It does everything except work!
customer_reviews.author: FLASH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this trimmer/edger
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this trimmer/edger. My favorite part is the edger. Being able to do it myself allows me to get the job done on my time instead of waiting on husband to do it after hours. Works great. Does my whole yard on one charge. I weed eat along house, both sides of large fence and trees. I edge along a sidewalk, and front and sides of house with landscaping. Gets the job done so neatly!
customer_reviews.author: mama1

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: It is a GREAT trimmer! It never fails...never once had to stop and refeed the string like the previous one. However, I thought the length was adjustable, and if I were a 6 foot man it would be fine. It isn't adjustable, and I'm a 75 year old woman about 5.6 now. Seriously would much rather have one shorter. Have thought about selling it and reordering one that is adjustable, but would loose money on the deal. Wish I had known!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte A. Ertelt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to charge
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a battery powered lawn power tool BUT.....I wished I would have had one of these years ago! Easy to charge, easy to operate, no gas fumes, don't have to worry about gas/oil mixing, easy clean up. Would purchase again in a minute.
customer_reviews.author: SKB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this WORX trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is great! It is light enough for a 75 year old female to use and it does the tough tall grass we hoped it would cut. Have used it over 30 minutes and the 3 battery indicator lights are still all there!
customer_reviews.author: nvsagebrush

customer_reviews.title: Switch went out after just several uses
customer_reviews.text: I guess the switch is bad because the battery is fine but it will not run. I am 12 days outside the return period window so will have to contact seller directly and ask them what they are going to do. Guess I'll have to have it fixed under warranty or something and mail it back and that will take weeks. What do I do about my yard in the meantime. If so, I'll just tell them I want to return for refuynd due to it being defective. This was given an excellent rating on Consumer Reports too.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A.

customer_reviews.title: The one string spool is not as good as a two string spool
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as the bracket for the trimming wheels broke, Only held on by I small rivet. The one string spool is not as good as a two string spool, The battery time is not the best in trimming tall weeds! I am not that impressed with this weed eater, I will use the replacement weed eater for light duty trimming, My gas weed eater puts this one to shame,
customer_reviews.author: honeydiper

customer_reviews.title: very well made. very nice to use.
customer_reviews.text: WOW what a tool. If your thinking of the smaller one don't do it. Get the big one. You will be much better off with the 56 volt. I have a big yard and it lasts a good 45 min if your doing a weekly trim. 25 / 30 min if your full power from start to finish. very quite very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: SP FPV

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted just three years even with room temp storage over winter.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 2017. Battery lasted only three years even with room temp. storage over winter. Quieter and less vibration than gas powered, just as powerful. Manufacturer honored warranty when motor had problem. However, I am going back to gas powered trimmer since a replacement battery is $126 in May of 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Shoey

customer_reviews.title: It's a beast!
customer_reviews.text: We moved from a house where we only had basic lawn to one with a lot of landscaping. We have what I think is vinca in large sections of the yard. We have the little 20v brother of this so the kids can help with yard work but it was no match for the landscaping. Enter this beast and we can now keep Audrey under control! Excellent tool, gets the job done. A little heavy for Mrs but if Mr is out of town she can handle it. Too big for the kids but they can do the edging with the 20v
customer_reviews.author: Eric Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: great job on this trimmer the wight is good the ...
customer_reviews.text: great job on this trimmer the wight is good the head is adjustable and it can be rotated and wheel put on the ground to do edging jobs nice! The battery power is great and the variable speed/power trigger is well balanced, just like a gas trimmer only thing I with is that it was a dual line trimmer, then it would be awsome
customer_reviews.author: kammen77

customer_reviews.title: Line advance malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think mine is working properly. Every time the head stops spinning, the line advances. I just put 6 feet of string on the spool and couldn’t even finish my back yard. I’m not accidentally touching the line advance button. It is brand new and has done it every time I’ve used it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product. It is expensive and on the 3rd use the line feeder does not work. Also, the power lever is malfunctioning. It will not power on when I press and I have to eject the battery and reinstall and then it will power on. What I do like about it is that it is battery operated and last which is decent but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this one!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the trimmer/ edger in May of 2019 used it maybe 5 or 6 times the whole motor head fell apart not just a screw everything went flying.don't know if I got all the pieces call Worx's. They are suppose to be sending out a new head never gave me a order number or a shipping date. Bad thing is I am still paying on the worthless thing.Might have to,get another one (not from Worx's) .
customer_reviews.author: Frozen in MN

customer_reviews.title: and easy for me to use
customer_reviews.text: The Worx cordless trimmer is all I hoped it would be. I am older and a little small in stature. The trimmer is light weigh, well balanced, and easy for me to use. The automatic string feed works well. I did discovered that getting too close to items such as my brick wall will cause the string to break. As I am getting used to the distance needed by the trimmer to operate properly, this is becoming no problem.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery tends to over heat. Have to cool it off before it will recharge. We have quite a bit of trimming to do and the battery runs out before we finish. Good for about 20 to 25 minutes of hard work.
customer_reviews.author: VRCJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic edger and trimmer. Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic!! I had the smaller Worx for a few years and moved to a house with 10X more edging required. This Beast is a monster. Quickly edges and trims. Battery life is Good. I got the set with blower so I have two batteries. Love this. Small frustration time to time with the cord not coming out but not biggie for me. Have had this thing more than 4 months. Love this system.
customer_reviews.author: FB4ND

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to WORX on this product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how anyone can give this "whacker" a low rating. I have used it for ~half a season and find it every bit as powerful as a gas-fed whacker; in fact, it could probably chop the legs off a bull (I think the handle is extra long for safety reasons). The best part is, no noise compared to the gas unit it replaced plus speed control. I have not found line usage to be at all excessive and the battery lasts through 2.5 rounds of weed clearing. . . . and, no, I don't work for WORX.
customer_reviews.author: G. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Variable speed works great and battery life is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Variable speed works great and keeps from using as much line. Battery life is excellent as I have trimmed my yard three times and still have power remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Karl PanKratz

customer_reviews.title: best of the best work as 10 guys for you get it for real
customer_reviews.text: cut tress . weed . grass . light to cry . i love it it is worth to get warranty for it really get it . i try many that is good god i am happy i did work in my yard less work nice result iam amazed
customer_reviews.author: mhda mstafa  and liila

customer_reviews.title: Weed eater very easy to use but not happy with battery life
customer_reviews.text: Weed eater very easy to use but not happy with battery life. First time used battery lasted 30-45 minutes. Ever since I bArely get 15 minutes from battery. Takes 3-4 days to get all the weedeating done because of having to recharge battery.
customer_reviews.author: connie scott

customer_reviews.title: this is the best trimmer i have ever had
customer_reviews.text: this is the best trimmer i have ever had. the conivence of just plugging in the battery is great. the power that is produced is great. no weed or grass has a chance. the battery life is great. neighbors cant believe how much lighter the weight difference from the gas trimmer they just set down.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this machine. I had a gas power and hated it. Load smelly and just didn’t like. This works as good as a gas power. I highly recommend. So happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Back off the throttle to stop rethreading
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very handy. So I was continually refeeding the line. I noticed if I backed off the throttle so it's not as powerful, the line doesn't snap off as much so I only had to rethread like once or twice during my edging instead of 20x. Maybe that will help some people. Overall I like it and does good work.
customer_reviews.author: James E Cucinelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It has the power of a gas motor. Tall grass does not get wrapped around the unit. Worx products are long lasting, lighter, and easier. It could use a strap. I made my own. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa DeBauche

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Powered Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how much power this battery powered trimmer has. I also like that this uses the thicker 0.08 trimmer string. I tried a lower voltage battery powered trimmer, which used the 0.065 trimmer string. What I found was the smaller diameter string did not hold up. Based on my previous experience with the other battery powered trimmer, I was hesitant with purchasing another battery powered trimmer. Based on the other reviews, I took a chance on this trimmer. I am very pleased with the chance I took on this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Took a little getting used to but it's pretty powerful for a battery operated machine and the charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to but it's pretty powerful for a battery operated machine and the charge easily lasts for the 30 minutes to complete my trimming. When the battery needs a charge, I would get 3 second spurts which made me falsely believe there was something wrong with the machine. I called the company and they were very professional. Glad I did not return it,.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M

customer_reviews.title: Great weedeater.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weedeater to be battery powered. It is as powerful as a gas powered weedeater. I like that it charges quickly. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this trimmer a “5” rating because it is so powerful and cuts through our horse pasture weeds with gusto! It is a little heavy, so I had to boost up my weight training!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vankdaloo

customer_reviews.title: Mostly all good. Self tapping cord is fair at best
customer_reviews.text: Mostly all good. Self tapping cord is fair at best. The wheels are too high for edging. Really like the power and the adjustability of the trimmer. It took three phone calls to get it correct.....bad charging unit....fine print....warranty issues dont imply free shipping
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I bought the WORX cordless Grass Trimmer for the family ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the WORX cordless Grass Trimmer for the family. The entire family loves the way it works. It's made life easier around here, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS! Got the weed whacker...Fully charged the battery...worked for about 1/2 hour until it burned up, not thick grass. I guess battery powered tools aren't perfected so I went out and bought a gas powered weed eater. Amazon allowed the return BUT IT COST ME $35.00 POSTAGE to send it back to the seller. Total ripoff, I'm out $35.00 for getting a defective tool. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Caty Cundy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, light weight, GREAT trimmer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest trimmer I have ever used!! The line feed is just great, perfectly balanced, not bulky or heavy. I'm 78 years old and i have had dozens of trimmers, all ended up in the trash!! Thank you WORX for the best trimmer ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Andre H.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and lightweight for a trimmer and edger.
customer_reviews.text: It was better than I expected and more powerful. It does a great job and it's easy to handle with the different positions needed for trimming or weed cutting. My only dislike is that it is longer than I thought but after the two weeks I've learned how to make it work for me. Battery life was great I can do the whole yard, 3/4 of an acre on one charge. I've only had it for 2 weeks so I have not had to charge it again yet.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: ... for cutting at the other end is so much better then my old line-powered grass trimmer is really great
customer_reviews.text: The balance with the battery at one end and the motor for cutting at the other end is so much better then my old line-powered grass trimmer is really great. It doesn't cause near the arm strain that the old one did. Also the heavier string is able to cut down weeds which always caused the string to break on my old grass trimmer. Battery life seems to exceed the 30 minutes that Workx specified by nearly twice.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very powerful and equal to gas power. I think the balance seems a little off though. The position it has to be held in causes my forearm to get sore.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power. No gas!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cabin in Michigan and it did everything I expected and more. The battery lasted about as long as I did. I'm going to be buying one for my place in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Sirgordy

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer lines breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in that The string breaks easily and often breaks within the spool housing. I have to stop many times to either advance the line or take it apart to pass the trimmer line through the hole. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best power to get the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The power to get the job done edging my yard both horizontal and best of all being able to transform it to vertical.
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my Sears 29cc which was a pain from the start. So far does the job of a gas trimmer with ease and without the headaches of 4-cycle belching oil leaking fuel dripping cruddy little engines!
customer_reviews.author: garo

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with command feed button
customer_reviews.text: Spool was melted tightly together, took much time to feed it correctly. Over feed & no feed happening.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Zapotok

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 56v WORX Cordless Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been very pleased with the trimmer. Easy to assemble and use. We have purchased several of the 56v WORX products and have been pleased with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn R

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this over my gas powered trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Love it and use it consistently over my gas powered trimmer. Just not having to mess with the gas & oil mix is so nice. In a pinch my wife even offers to help now since there is no issue with getting it started. My gas powered one was kind of cold blooded and took some effort to get started. Wish the gauge of the trimmer string was thicker but otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sedg

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power and really does the job some jobs need larger string and stronger gas motor but this is great for 95%
customer_reviews.text: Replaced echo and one other smaller battery operated trimmer from Home Depot. Lots of power and really does the job some jobs need larger string and stronger gas motor but this is great for 95%.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Color me impressed! Used my WG191 this am for 1st time. Well made, quiet, easy to use, works as described. I got appx 1 1/2 hours of cutting tall weeds and grass on not quite fully charged battery with temps in 80’s and climbing fast. I am 5’4” and I’m my 60s and the only trouble I had was with preloaded twisted string getting stuck together on spool.
customer_reviews.author: catherine carrico

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I am very grateful for this tool. No gas, no oil, just a battery and I am able to cut the front and backyard with it. It charges really nice and its light too.
customer_reviews.author: Hockey_Dad

customer_reviews.title: thought this product would be superior to others I have used in past
customer_reviews.text: Have had issues with trimmer since got it... only used about 6 times... since March. spools of line do not release as suppose to.. have to stop and pull out or take apart to unwind line... sometimes after only 15-20 minutes of use the trimmer quits. Battery says green, but doesn't work. So I don't know.. frustrating, thought this product would be superior to others I have used in past.... $200 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use for a couple months had a issue with the trigger not working Called company they charged me only shipping and sent me out a brand new unit still not happy with the battery though
customer_reviews.author: Bryan May

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: After using trimmer last summer, put it away in house for the winter. Last week charged battery to start using again, was on charger for 30 seconds and said charge was complete. BUT NOT, thinking it was charger tried a friends and same result, replacement battery cost $96.00. NOT VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Billyjack

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: So far have edged all around the yard 3 times on one battery charge. Edging feature works well. Completely satisfied for now.. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Fromme

customer_reviews.title: String doesn't feed
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated that even new with 1st reel of string does not feed string!
customer_reviews.author: nc

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer, bad edger
customer_reviews.text: Great grass trimmer, but it's usefulness as an edger is a joke. I ended up getting an actual edger and then use this for in-between edging to keep it trimmed up. Battery lasts a good long time. Seems pretty solidly built compared to the B&D it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: G. Flannagan

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, will tell everyone I know to buy one.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, works perfect for even some tough spots on the property. Just wish the battery lasted longer but I am going to get a second battery. They do charge up quickly. So happy now I can take care of my own place and not have to pay someone else. Even my 13 year old has used it and said it was easy to use. Never will I get another gas trimmer because it shook my shoulder so bad that my arm would swell. Great product and I will tell everyone I know to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Childs

customer_reviews.title: It’s light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this !!! It’s light and easy to use. He used to take hours edging our lawn with his electric bc of cord manurvering and now it takes about 30-45 min to edge the front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Good product, disappointing shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I like the grass trimmer. I also have the mower and leaf blower so I can interchange batteries. My only complaint is with shipping and not the product. My recent experiences have been to expect an extra day or two for shipping than indicated. I've been a prime member for a number of years and am debating whether it's worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: wxcoin

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, just at lower speed keeps feeding string only fault so far. Plenty of power and love the wheels for edging.
customer_reviews.author: Elemento

customer_reviews.title: Nicely engineered for ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Nicely engineered for ease of use. Its on the heavy side and needs a shoulder strap if you're going to be using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael LaForest

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer/edger!
customer_reviews.text: Great features...cuts very well for battery power and the battery life is very good as well. Definitely the top of the line for a battery powered trimmer. Edger works great and the on command line feed is a great option! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed - Purchased wheel would not attach
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed - Purchased wheel would not attach. Returned got another and second one wheel would not attach.
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer and edger
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Easy thrist head to edge. Easy to reach momentary button to stop running which will extend more string. All around good machine
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful! Absolutely lost No power or torque when zipping through our 1/3 acre property
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is better than expected, but the automatic string release is not very good. Winding of the string on the spool takes precision that you'll have to do over and over again as the string spool does not easily advance automatically.
customer_reviews.author: T F.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give this a try over a new 2 cycle. My biggest hope was that this would be long enough as every weedeater ive ever used has felt short leaving me with back pain. This unit is long enough!! Being electric we were concerned about how powerful it was so we went with the 56v and it has plenty of power. I run around my half acre in about 15-20 minutes with little effort. My inlaws like it and will be purchasing this model also. Only con I see is that the replacment batteries will be costly. Picked up the Square Trade protection so they can handle that cost for me down the road...
customer_reviews.author: R.R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Strong and powerful 💪🏾, pretty heavy though😨
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a birthday present and he LOVES it! He says it’s great battery life, however it is pretty heavy and long so it is difficult. It’s the size of a traditional weed eater, but it bigger than the first generation weed eater. Great gift 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelah

customer_reviews.title: its is quite heavy and awkward to handle.
customer_reviews.text: quite heavy and very awkward to handle. also the nylon string wears out very fast and does not want to stay long when edging.
customer_reviews.author: Sean LaBrie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very stout. String is a lil smaller than I'd like. Breaks easy on thick weeds. Battery doesn't last very long but is a nice setup. Edger works great.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Almost as much power as 2 cycle
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I think my old 2 cycle had slightly more power, but the WORX trimmer has plenty of power for a home owner. And of course cleaner and none of the difficulty of a pull start gas model.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Good balance
customer_reviews.text: Last a good time on a charge. Quiet enough so the neighbors don’t complain when using early in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: string advance does not work as well as I expected
customer_reviews.text: the trimmer certainly has enough power however, the advance mechanism doesn't work as well as I expected. The literature indicates that simply hitting the line advance button will advance the line aned it does to a point but it the advanced string is gone in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: steven r.

customer_reviews.title: Also the battery easily lasts long enough to edge all the walks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the power this trimmer has. Also the battery easily lasts long enough to edge all the walks and gardens and trim around the house. I got an extra battery but really wouldnt't have needed it. Great product, hope it lasts through the years.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G Karl

customer_reviews.title: bFirst thought it was great then it broke at base very thin I contacted ...
customer_reviews.text: bFirst thought it was great then it broke at base very thin I contacted the seller via email have had no response
customer_reviews.author: Body Guy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Trimmer/Edger I edged my lawn and get compliments regularly. I've already had to do 3 lawns because people come up to me. It is very powerful and all of the men in my family are impressed! Its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ela Vanilla

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this weedeater!  It works great and holds a charge for a long time!  I'm tired before it is!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and just as described! It works great and holds a charge for a long time! I'm tired before it is!
customer_reviews.author: Joan W.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING...I no longer have to wait for someone to start my weedeater. The power is surprising. Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worx 13" Cordless Grass Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: this is the best trimmer I have ever Owen thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money Light weight and motor is strong. Much better than any with those that require cords. Relatively quiet. Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. starnes

customer_reviews.title: Better them the gas one
customer_reviews.text: Waou!!! Better them the gas one, not heavy , easy to used and two ways to used it.
customer_reviews.author: BLANCA RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Love Worx!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trimmer!!! Just as powerful as a gas trimmer without the hassle. Great edger and trimmer with excellent battery life. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: No free spools
customer_reviews.text: Product is strong and battery life is great. Wheels are to high for edging. No adjustment. String breaks way to frequent. No free spools like past edger/trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: robert dalton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Spool keeps spitting out line without clicking the button causing the line to get very long and wasteful. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. I have acres to care for and I can take it every where. Super light, but gets the job done on small grass and tall weeds.
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn Hooper

customer_reviews.title: WORX WG191 56V Max Lithium-Ion Cordless Grass...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and Very Powerful, Very lite, and easy to handle.. cuts thru tall weeds and Johnson grass like Butter.. I recommend this product..
customer_reviews.author: George Vandervort

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't it work
customer_reviews.text: Cant get it to work.. charged the battery for 3 days... start it up runs for 5 seconds and won't start again
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reckley

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the WORX WG191 base on the good overall reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the WORX WG191 base on the good overall reviews, everything work as it should be, however, the line auto feed function is a design flaws, it feed too fast and too much line, not only waste a lot of line but also leave long line cut away or the line dangle off the trimmer head at a slow speed. I have to pick up these lines from the yard after trimming. I would prefer a push bottom line feed only instead of auto feed. Not satisfied with the purchase. Is there a way to stop the line auto feed function?
customer_reviews.author: O. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I could probably edge my yard and both my neighbors with on battery charge. Effective weed eater.
customer_reviews.author: Moonopals

customer_reviews.title: I like it but
customer_reviews.text: Really works good as a weed eater not quite as good as an edger. the edger does not get a very straight line. It is useable for an edger just the trim line will not do as good as a blade
customer_reviews.author: oldflem

customer_reviews.title: It WORX
customer_reviews.text: Worx great. I wish it were a little shorter in length but a nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: James Kadiddlehopper

product_meta.title: WORX WG191 56V 13" Cordless String Trimmer & Edger with Quick 90 Min Battery Charger
product_meta.description: Style:Cordless Grass TrimmerThe WORX WG191 56V Max Li-Ion 13-Inch Cordless Grass Trimmer features a new Command FeedTM system that allows instant trimmer line advancing – no more bumping or waiting for the line to advance before cutting. With Command FeedTM, the user electronically controls when to feed more line through a simple push-button above the trigger. This not only conserves line, it eliminates downtime when edging and waiting for additional line to advance. This trimmer uses a thicker professional-grade trimmer line (.080” diameter, 1” x 20' in length) that’s more durable than conventional line. WORX incorporates a quick-change, easy-to-load, pre-wound spool accessory, so there’s no fumbling with line changes. The WG191 also has a new method to switch from trimming to edging – the push-button feature delivers a seamless transition between functions by simply pressing a button at the top of the shaft and twisting. The WG191 comes with a set of twin wheels that help guide the tool while edging, wheels that can be removed and housed on the lower shaft to give you full visibility while trimming. The head pivots from 0 to 90 degrees to provide any angle needed for trimming and edging.
feature_bullets: Variable speed control delivers additional runtime and powerful versatility. Line diameter: 0. 080 inch
Innovative Command feed Spool system offers on-demand Line feeding
Professional-grade trimmer line handles the toughest tasks
Long-lasting max Lithium power with battery indicator
Pivoting cutting head and straight shaft design tackles any terrain
Rotating rear handle offers maximum comfort while edging
Quick conversion from trimmer to inline wheeled edging

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars347 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
